name: telsia
description: Build scripts for the Telsia browser extension.

scripts.clean: echo "Cleaning Builds and Release folders..." && npx rimraf Builds Release
scripts.build:base:chrome: echo "Copying base files for Chrome..." && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*" Builds/chrome --ignore "Source/**/*.chrome.js,Source/**/*.firefox.js" && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*.chrome.js" Builds/chrome && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');(function w(d){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true})){const fp=p.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory())w(fp);else if(e.name.endsWith('.chrome.js'))fs.renameSync(fp,p.join(p.dirname(fp),e.name.replace('.chrome.js','.js')))}})(\"Builds/chrome\")"
scripts.update:version:chrome: echo "Updating Chrome manifest version..." && node scripts/update-manifest-version.mjs Builds/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: echo "Building Chrome version..." && npm run build:base:chrome && npm run update:version:chrome
scripts.build:base:firefox: echo "Copying base files for Firefox..." && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*" Builds/firefox --ignore "Source/**/*.chrome.js,Source/**/*.firefox.js" && npx cpx2 "Source/**/*.firefox.js" Builds/firefox && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),p=require('path');(function w(d){for(const e of fs.readdirSync(d,{withFileTypes:true})){const fp=p.join(d,e.name);if(e.isDirectory())w(fp);else if(e.name.endsWith('.firefox.js'))fs.renameSync(fp,p.join(p.dirname(fp),e.name.replace('.firefox.js','.js')))}})(\"Builds/firefox\")"
scripts.update:version:firefox: echo "Updating Firefox manifest version..." && node scripts/update-manifest-version.mjs Builds/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: echo "Building Firefox version..." && npm run build:base:firefox && npm run update:version:firefox
scripts.build: echo "Starting full build..." && npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && echo "Builds complete."
scripts.package:chrome: echo "Packaging Chrome version..." && node package.mjs Builds/chrome Release/telsia-chrome
scripts.package:firefox: echo "Packaging Firefox version..." && node package.mjs Builds/firefox Release/telsia-firefox
scripts.package: echo "Starting full package process..." && npm run build && npm run package:chrome && npm run package:firefox && echo "All packages created in Release folder."
